stack.description: If specified, this item will be given to the player (can be specified in an inventory slot).
stack.markdownDescription: If specified, this item will be given to the player (can be specified in an inventory slot).

stacks.description: If specified, these items will be given to the player (can be specified in an inventory slot).
stacks.markdownDescription: If specified, these items will be given to the player (can be specified in an inventory slot).

recurrent.description: Determines whether the specified item(s) should be given after respawning.
recurrent.markdownDescription: Determines whether the specified item(s) should be given after respawning.
